name: Princess's Peak
description:
This is a puzzle game that incorporates guessing to get characters and interact with the characters.
According to the remaining number of cards in the upper left corner, guess the card that your opponent will play and beat them to get the character tokens. Once all the tokens are obtained, the character will be unlocked.
The difficulty will increase as the game progresses

Game features:
All characters are 18+
Beautiful Art
Dynamic CGs
7 unique and different girls
